meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of achondroplasia.
meanings.sent1: The achondroplastic features of the statue made it easily recognizable.
meanings.sent2: The doctor explained that the achondroplastic condition affects bone growth.
meanings.sent3: The achondroplastic garden gnome seemed to be the leader of the group.
meanings.sent4: Her achondroplastic personality shone through in her determination and resilience.
meanings.sent5: The achondroplastic tree stood out in the forest with its stunted height.

meanings.sent1: The achondroplastic in the wheelchair smiled warmly at the children.
meanings.sent2: The achondroplastic at the event shared their experiences with grace and humor.
meanings.sent3: The achondroplastic at the party was the life of the celebration.
meanings.sent4: Her daughter, an achondroplastic, inspired others with her positive outlook.
meanings.sent5: The achondroplastic in the play stole the audience's hearts with their performance.
